TextView.android:text: If you have seen all hill stations in Gujarat, then it is time to head out to Lonavala. A popular hill station in Pune district of Maharashtra, Lonavla offers beautiful spectacles of the lush greenery that enfolds this place. Well known for the production of hard candy Chikki, Lonavlaâ€™s proximity to Mumbai and Pune make it an all-time-favourite weekend getaway for the residents and tourists alike. Close to Lonavla is another hot favourite hill station Khandala that experiences a lot of footfall. Once there, you can explore the caves, fortresses of Lohagad and Visapur located close to Lonavla or take up the Andharban trek that will take you through the dense forests and waterfalls leading to Bhira.
